of the [93msolution[0m and [93mdissolved[0m [93moxygen[0m ([93mDO[0m). [93mKinetic[0m [93mstudies[0m and [93madsorption[0m [93misotherm[0m [93manalysis[0m [93mdemonstrated[0m that
